story:
-----VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL ABAJO-----

HELP US IMPROVE MORE THAN 25,000 LIVES BY PROVIDING HIGH QUALITY ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION TO CHILDREN LIVING IN LAKE ATITLAN, GUATEMALA.

Friends of Lake Atitlán is a NGO fighting to improve the quality of life of its communities here in rural Guatemala, by promoting and facilitating environmental education, rescue and sanitation of Lake Atitlan, reforestation and scientific research since 1990.

We have developed a very important and unique program in environmental education designed specifically for the needs and context of Lake Atitlán. We seek to sensitize, promote, and encourage participation in caring for our natural resources.

The educational material Education for Conservation encompasses activities, experiments, and thoughts aimed at helping to learn about sustainable ecological practices and habits. Friends of the Lake created this concept in collaboration with the Guatemala’s Ministry of Education, Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources, and local and international institutions. With great effort, we have succeeded in making this project sustainable, although we receive no funds from governmental organizations. 

In 2011 we published all this material for the use of principals, teachers, and students of the elementary school level. In 2013 we expanded the program to students in the junior high-school school level and, in 2015, for the high-school level.

Through the years, we have distributed more than 10,000 copies of Education for Conservation in 19 municipalities of the Sololá region. Distribution of these texts goes hand-in-hand with training and strengthening the capacities of the teaching staff and directors through technical and pedagogical means, and implementation of environmental knowledge. We are currently working in 110 public schools. Our challenge is to achieve monitoring and follow-up of this material in all the schools of the department of Sololá.  

More than 3,000 teachers, 680 directors,and 95,000 students have taken part in this program.

Lake Atitlán basin has a population of approximately 400,000 of which half are under the age of 18. Only 50% are assisted by the official education system. 

The Education for Conservation materials are our main tools. These books are already a few years old and we need to update them because much has changed here in Guatemala. For example, the Lake's water quality is affecting our health and it is urgent that we get the message out. 

The team must gather new information, research and analyze the entire situation, in order to update, print, and distribute new manuals. We would also like to broaden the coverage of the program.  For all that, we need more sponsors and funds to reach this goal. 

We cannot achieve this without your generous support. Please sponsor our project. Let’s do this together. Let’s change the world one student at a time.

Since the Association took its first steps in 1990, Friends of Lake Atitlán grew rapidly. Now we are a family of 25 members: employees, neighbors, volunteers, engineers, scientists working in different departments such as Sanitation and Rescue of the Lake, Reforestation, Scientific Research and, of course, Environmental Education. 

This team includes 9 members, all young and passionate environmental education promotors from Lake Atitlán basin. They speak Spanish and their Mayan languages - Tz'utujil and Kaqchikel - so they can easily connect with the children and teaching staff.

We estimate that the full cost of updating, graphic design, and printing of the new educational materials will add up to US$30,000.

 

Sponsored Perks: Together with the Jeweller's Papidu /Joyería Papidu, La Noria Shopping Center, Grønn, Guatemalan Coffee, painter Humberto Garavito and sundry Arts and crafts we are offering some amazing gifts in return for your donations. Don't forget to keep following us; more gifts are on the way!          **See right-hand side of page for details!**

Jeweller's Papidu /Joyería Papidu

The collection ATI'T 'YA is designed and manufactured in Guatemala by the famous Joyería Papidu, with hand manufactured textils produced by skilled hands at Lake Atitlan. Different combinations of metal and fabric, representing the villages that exist around the lake. 

Check out the Ring size chart to help you select the right one for you. Here! 

All combinations are possible from the villages, sterling silver 925 to Gold 18 karat.

Grønn

They create high quality, hand made glasses and planters manufactured by mothers that live around Guatemala's City landfill, upcycling glass bottles. They work in partnership with an NGO Guatemaltecos Extraordinarios that provides education for kids at risk of falling in gangs or drugs, through employing mothers, so kids can have better opportunities and a brighter future. 

Guatemalan paintor Humberto Garavito (1897-1970)

Well-known Humberto Garavito was one of the most famous landscape paintor of the 20th century in Central America. After his studies in Madrid and Paris, he became the Director of the Academia de Bellas Artes of Guatemala.He was able to capture the natural beauty of Lake Atitlan and its colorful mayan villages. We offer you 6 different litographs from his oil on canvas artwork. 

**Check out the right-hand side of page for more amazing gift!**

SHARE the LET'S BUILD THE FUTURE THROUGH EDUCATION Campaign and help us help them because we believe in the power of education and in big changes starting with small steps.

Please take a moment to spread the word about our campaign by sharing it with your networks - Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+ and anywhere else. For those who are unable to financially support the project, we ask that you help us spread the word!    

                                   

How much money from this campaign goes directly to the children? EVERYTHING. Except the costs of IndieGoGo and Sponsored Perks. See our budget in How is your money spent section.

How can I pay? We accept major credit cards and every penny counts to continue with this program that could become a model for communities in Guatemala and Latin America. Donating is easy and only takes 1 minute. Just enter your credit or debit card information and the amount of your donation. See our video for a tutorial on how to donate.

Can I keep track of the progress of the campaign and what happens afterward with Education for Conservation project? Yes! We’ll keep you up to date on our progress over the coming weeks so you know how the campaign is doing. All donators are invited to follow us on Facebook 

We are regularly posting social media updates, pictures and videos, so you'll see how your contribution is making a difference.

Can I donate from anywhere? Anyplace in the world and at any time before August 30th 2017.

When and how will I receive my gift? Each donator will receive his or her gift at the end of the campaign, and depending where you live in the world and the expedition delay, you will receive your perk between September and November 2017.

Talk to us!  In case of any other questions, please post your question in the comments box below and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. You can also reach out to us through email amigoatitlan@gmail.com

Get involved ! Let's build their future together !

  • Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/AmigoAtitlan/
  • Website english & español
  • Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/amigoslagoatitlan/

Tweet your support with #EducatingAtitlan #EducandoAtitlan

Asociación Amigos del Lago de Atitlán es una organización sin fines de lucro, dedicada por más de 15 años a la educación ambiental en Guatemala.  Hemos desarrollado un programa único en 110 escuelas, pero ahora necesitamos actualizar e imprimir nuevos libros educativos.  ¡Educa hoy y educarás el futuro! 

Cada libro puede despertar el conocimiento. Cada pluma puede escribir una nueva historia. Cada mente puede crear inventos. Cada niño merece un mejor futuro.

Podemos mejorar la vida de cada niño si le brindamos educación de alta calidad.  ¡Ayúdanos a ayudarlos!

AYÚDANOS A MEJORAR MÁS DE 25,000 VIDAS BRINDÁNDOLE EDUCACIÓN AMBIENTAL DE ALTA CALIDAD A NIÑOS QUE VIVEN EN ATITLÁN, GUATEMALA.

La Asociación Amigos del Lago de Atitlán es una ONG que, desde 1990, lucha por mejorar la calidad de vida de sus comunidades aquí, en el área rural de Guatemala, mediante la promoción y facilitación de la educación ambiental, el rescate y saneamiento del Lago de Atitlán, la reforestación y la investigación científica.

Hemos desarrollado un programa muy importante y único en Guatemala, diseñado específicamente para las necesidades y el contexto del Lago de Atitlán.  Buscamos sensibilizar, promover y estimular la participación en el cuidado de nuestros recursos naturales.

El material educativo Educando para Conservar incorpora actividades, experimentos y pensamientos con el propósito de ayudar en la enseñanza de prácticas y hábitos sostenibles.  La Asociación Amigos del Lago creó este concepto en colaboración con el Ministerio de Educación, el Ministerio de Agricultura y Recursos Naturales e instituciones locales e internacionales.  Con gran esfuerzo, hemos logrado que este proyecto sea sostenible, aunque no recibimos fondos de organizaciones gubernamentales.

En el 2011, publicamos todo este material para el uso de directores, maestros y alumnos de nivel primario.  En el 2013, expandimos el programa a estudiantes de nivel básico y, en el 2015, a nivel diversificado.

A través de los años, hemos distribuido más de 10,000 ediciones de Educando para Conservar en 19 municipios del departamento de Sololá.  La distribución de estos textos va de la mano con entrenamiento y fortalecimiento de las capacidades del personal docente y directores mediante medios técnicos y pedagógicos y la implementación de conocimiento ambiental.  Actualmente, trabajamos en 110 escuelas públicas.  Nuestro reto es alcanzar el monitoreo y seguimiento de dicho material en todas las escuelas del departamento de Sololá. 

Más de 3,000 maestros, 680 directores y 95,000 estudiantes han participado en este programa.

La Cuenca del Lago de Atitlán tiene una población aproximada de 400,000 habitantes de los cuales la mitad son menores de los 18 años.  Solamente el 50% es atendido por el sistema educativo oficial.

Los materiales de Educando para Conservar son nuestras herramientas principales.  Estos libros ya tienen algunos años y necesitamos actualizarlos porque mucho ha cambiado aquí en Guatemala.  Por ejemplo, la calidad del agua del Lago está afectando nuestra salud y es urgente que logremos comunicar este mensaje. 

El equipo debe recabar nueva información, analizar toda la situación, para poder actualizar, imprimir y distribuir nuevos manuales.  También quisiéramos ampliar la cobertura del programa.  Para todo esto, necesitamos más patrocinadores y fondos con el fin de alcanzar esta meta.

No podemos lograr esto sin su generoso apoyo.  Por favor patrocine nuestro proyecto.  ¡Hagásmoslo juntos!  ¡Cambiemos el mundo un estudiante a la vez!

Desde que la Asociación dio sus primeros pasos en 1990, Los Amigos del Lago de Atitlán crecieron rápidamente.  Ahora somos una familia de 25 miembros:  empleados, vecinos, voluntarios, ingenieros, científicos – trabajando en diferentes sectores tales como Saneamiento y Rescate del Lago, Reforestación, Investigación Científica y, por supuesto, Educación Ambiental.

Este equipo incluye 9 miembros, todos jóvenes y apasionados promotores de educación ambiental de la Cuenca del Lago.  Hablan español y sus lenguas mayas – tz’utujil y kaqchikel – así que conectan fácilmente con los niños y el personal docente.

El costo total estimado para la actualización, diseño gráfico e impresión del nuevo material educativo asciende a US$30,000.

Regalos Patrocinados:  Junto con la Joyería Papidu, Centro Comercial La Noria, Café Guatemalteco Grønn, el pintor Humberto Garavito y diferentes Artesanías, estamos ofreciendo regalos magníficos a cambio de sus donaciones.  Vea el lado derecho de la página para enterarse de los detalles.

No olvide de seguirnos.  ¡Los regales continúan!

Joyería Papidu

Las piezas únicas de  ATI'T 'YA son diseñadas y fabricadas en Guatemala por la famosa Joyería Papidu, con textiles hechos a mano producidos por manos expertas del lago Atitlan. Diferentes combinaciones de metal y tela representando los pueblos que existen alrededor del lago.

Vea la tabla de medidas de anillos. Aquí !

 to help you select the right one for you. Here! 

Todas las cominaciones son posible con los pueblos y metal Sterling plata 925 y Oro 18K.

Grønn

Gronn es una empresa guatemalteca que fabrique productos reciclados de alta calidad para el hogar, hechos de manera artesanal, reutilizando botellas de vidrio que han sido recolectadas en diferentes puntos en Ciudad de Guatemala y así dándoles un segundo ciclo de vida a las botellas, fabricando vasos, macetas, floreros, entre otros productos. Gronn trabaja de la mano con una ONG Guatemaltecos Extraordinarios que se preocupa por brindar mejoras sociales a familias de alto riesgo en la ciudad.  Todas las empleadas son mujeres del área del relleno sanitario, así sus niños tendrán mejores oportunidades en el futuro.

El pintor guatemalteco Humberto Garavito (1897-1970)

El famoso pintor garavito fue uno de los pintores de Centroamerica más reconocidos del sigglo 20. Estudió en Madrid y París, luego retornó a Guatemala en 1927, y el año siguiente desempeñó la dirección de la Academia de Bellas Artes. Su técnica preferida fue el óleo sobre tela  y su tema predilecto, el paisaje. Logró captar la belleza del Lago de Atitlán, sus pueblos y trajes de gran colorido. Les ofrecemos 6 litografías de sus obras en donde se pueden admirar las perfectas equivalencias entre luz y color. 

**Vea el lado derecho de la página para enterarse de los detalles.**

COMPARTE la Campaña CONSTRUYAMOS EL FUTURO A TRAVÉS DE LA EDUCACIÓN y ayúdanos a ayudarlos, porque creemos en el poder de la educación y en pequeños pasos que llevan a grandes cambios.

Por favor, toma un momento para extender la noticia sobre nuestra campaña compartiéndola en tus redes sociales – Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+ y en cualquier otra.  Para aquellos que no pueden apoyar el proyecto con fondos, les pedimos que nos ayuden a transmitir la noticia.        

¿Cuánto dinero de esta campaña va directamente a los niños?  TODO, con excepción de los costos de IndieGoGo y los Regalos Patrocinados.  Vea nuestro presupuesto in la sección Cómo se invierte su dinero.

¿Cómo puedo pagar?  Aceptamos tarjetas de crédito principales y cada centavo cuenta para continuar con este programa que podría ser un modelo para comunidades en Guatemala y América Latina.  Donar es fácil y solo toma 1 minuto.  Solo ingrese los datos de su tarjeta de crédito o débito y la cantidad que desea donar.  Vea nuestro video con una explicación de cómo donar.

¿Puedo seguir el progreso de la campaña y de lo que sucede después con el proyecto Educando para Conservar ?  ¡Sí!  Lo mantendremos actualizado del progreso en las próximas semanas para que sepa cómo va la campaña.  Todos los patrocinadores están invitados a seguirnos en Facebook.

Posteamos regularmente actualizaciones, fotos y videos en los medios sociales para que puedas ver cómo tu contribución está marcando la diferencia.

¿Puedo donar desde cualquier lugar?  Sí, desde cualquier lugar del mundo y en cualquier momento antes del 30 de agosto, 2017.

¿Cuándo y cómo recibiré mi regalo?  Cada donante recibirá su regalo al finalizar la campaña y, dependiendo de su ubicación en el mundo y del tiempo de envío, recibirá su perk  entre septiembre y noviembre del 2017.

Comunícate con nosotros.  En caso de preguntas, por favor postea tu duda en la casilla de comentarios a continuación y les responderemos lo antes posible.  También puedes comunicarte a través de amigoatitlan@gmail.com

 ¡ Involúcrate!  Construyamos juntos su futuro !

  • Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/AmigoAtitlan
  • Sitio web English & Español
  • Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/amigoslagoatitlan/
  • Twitea tu apoyo con  #EducatingAtitlan #EducandoAtitlan

-----VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL ABAJO-----
HELP US IMPROVE MORE THAN 25,000 LIVES BY PROVIDING HIGH QUALITY ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION TO CHILDREN LIVING IN LAKE ATITLAN, GUATEMALA.

Friends of Lake Atitlán is a NGO fighting to improve the quality of life of its communities here in rural Guatemala, by promoting and facilitating environmental education, rescue and sanitation of Lake Atitlan, reforestation and scientific research since 1990.
We have developed a very important and unique program in environmental education designed specifically for the needs and context of Lake Atitlán. We seek to sensitize, promote, and encourage participation in caring for our natural resources.
The educational material Education for Conservation encompasses activities, experiments, and thoughts aimed at helping to learn about sustainable ecological practices and habits. Friends of the Lake created this concept in collaboration with the Guatemala’s Ministry of Education, Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources, and local and international institutions. With great effort, we have succeeded in making this project sustainable, although we receive no funds from governmental organizations. 

In 2011 we published all this material for the use of principals, teachers, and students of the elementary school level. In 2013 we expanded the program to students in the junior high-school school level and, in 2015, for the high-school level.
Through the years, we have distributed more than 10,000 copies of Education for Conservation in 19 municipalities of the Sololá region. Distribution of these texts goes hand-in-hand with training and strengthening the capacities of the teaching staff and directors through technical and pedagogical means, and implementation of environmental knowledge. We are currently working in 110 public schools. Our challenge is to achieve monitoring and follow-up of this material in all the schools of the department of Sololá.  

More than 3,000 teachers, 680 directors,and 95,000 students have taken part in this program.

Lake Atitlán basin has a population of approximately 400,000 of which half are under the age of 18. Only 50% are assisted by the official education system. 
The Education for Conservation materials are our main tools. These books are already a few years old and we need to update them because much has changed here in Guatemala. For example, the Lake's water quality is affecting our health and it is urgent that we get the message out. 
The team must gather new information, research and analyze the entire situation, in order to update, print, and distribute new manuals. We would also like to broaden the coverage of the program.  For all that, we need more sponsors and funds to reach this goal. 
We cannot achieve this without your generous support. Please sponsor our project. Let’s do this together. Let’s change the world one student at a time.

Since the Association took its first steps in 1990, Friends of Lake Atitlán grew rapidly. Now we are a family of 25 members: employees, neighbors, volunteers, engineers, scientists working in different departments such as Sanitation and Rescue of the Lake, Reforestation, Scientific Research and, of course, Environmental Education. 

This team includes 9 members, all young and passionate environmental education promotors from Lake Atitlán basin. They speak Spanish and their Mayan languages - Tz'utujil and Kaqchikel - so they can easily connect with the children and teaching staff.


We estimate that the full cost of updating, graphic design, and printing of the new educational materials will add up to US$30,000.


 

Sponsored Perks: Together with the Jeweller's Papidu /Joyería Papidu, La Noria Shopping Center, Grønn, Guatemalan Coffee, painter Humberto Garavito and sundry Arts and crafts we are offering some amazing gifts in return for your donations. Don't forget to keep following us; more gifts are on the way!          **See right-hand side of page for details!**
Jeweller's Papidu /Joyería Papidu
The collection ATI'T 'YA is designed and manufactured in Guatemala by the famous Joyería Papidu, with hand manufactured textils produced by skilled hands at Lake Atitlan. Different combinations of metal and fabric, representing the villages that exist around the lake. 
Check out the Ring size chart to help you select the right one for you. Here! 
All combinations are possible from the villages, sterling silver 925 to Gold 18 karat.

Grønn
They create high quality, hand made glasses and planters manufactured by mothers that live around Guatemala's City landfill, upcycling glass bottles. They work in partnership with an NGO Guatemaltecos Extraordinarios that provides education for kids at risk of falling in gangs or drugs, through employing mothers, so kids can have better opportunities and a brighter future. 

Guatemalan paintor Humberto Garavito (1897-1970)
Well-known Humberto Garavito was one of the most famous landscape paintor of the 20th century in Central America. After his studies in Madrid and Paris, he became the Director of the Academia de Bellas Artes of Guatemala.He was able to capture the natural beauty of Lake Atitlan and its colorful mayan villages. We offer you 6 different litographs from his oil on canvas artwork. 

**Check out the right-hand side of page for more amazing gift!**

SHARE the LET'S BUILD THE FUTURE THROUGH EDUCATION Campaign and help us help them because we believe in the power of education and in big changes starting with small steps.

Please take a moment to spread the word about our campaign by sharing it with your networks - Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+ and anywhere else. For those who are unable to financially support the project, we ask that you help us spread the word!    
                                   

How much money from this campaign goes directly to the children? EVERYTHING. Except the costs of IndieGoGo and Sponsored Perks. See our budget in How is your money spent section.
How can I pay? We accept major credit cards and every penny counts to continue with this program that could become a model for communities in Guatemala and Latin America. Donating is easy and only takes 1 minute. Just enter your credit or debit card information and the amount of your donation. See our video for a tutorial on how to donate.
Can I keep track of the progress of the campaign and what happens afterward with Education for Conservation project? Yes! We’ll keep you up to date on our progress over the coming weeks so you know how the campaign is doing. All donators are invited to follow us on Facebook 
We are regularly posting social media updates, pictures and videos, so you'll see how your contribution is making a difference.
Can I donate from anywhere? Anyplace in the world and at any time before August 30th 2017.
When and how will I receive my gift? Each donator will receive his or her gift at the end of the campaign, and depending where you live in the world and the expedition delay, you will receive your perk between September and November 2017.

Talk to us!  In case of any other questions, please post your question in the comments box below and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. You can also reach out to us through email amigoatitlan@gmail.com
Get involved ! Let's build their future together !

Por favor, toma un momento para extender la noticia sobre nuestra campaña compartiéndola en tus redes sociales – Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+ y en cualquier otra.  Para aquellos que no pueden apoyar el proyecto con fondos, les pedimos que nos ayuden a transmitir la noticia.

¿Cómo puedo pagar?  Aceptamos tarjetas de crédito principales y cada centavo cuenta para continuar con este programa que podría ser un modelo para comunidades en Guatemala y América Latina.  Donar es fácil y solo toma 1 minuto.  Solo ingrese los datos de su tarjeta de crédito o débito y la cantidad que desea donar.  Vea nuestro video con una explicación de cómo donar.
¿Puedo seguir el progreso de la campaña y de lo que sucede después con el proyecto Educando para Conservar ?  ¡Sí!  Lo mantendremos actualizado del progreso en las próximas semanas para que sepa cómo va la campaña.  Todos los patrocinadores están invitados a seguirnos en Facebook.
Posteamos regularmente actualizaciones, fotos y videos en los medios sociales para que puedas ver cómo tu contribución está marcando la diferencia.
¿Puedo donar desde cualquier lugar?  Sí, desde cualquier lugar del mundo y en cualquier momento antes del 30 de agosto, 2017.
¿Cuándo y cómo recibiré mi regalo?  Cada donante recibirá su regalo al finalizar la campaña y, dependiendo de su ubicación en el mundo y del tiempo de envío, recibirá su perk  entre septiembre y noviembre del 2017.

Comunícate con nosotros.  En caso de preguntas, por favor postea tu duda en la casilla de comentarios a continuación y les responderemos lo antes posible.  También puedes comunicarte a través de amigoatitlan@gmail.com
 ¡ Involúcrate!  Construyamos juntos su futuro !

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/AmigoAtitlan

Sitio web English & Español

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/amigoslagoatitlan/


Twitea tu apoyo con  #EducatingAtitlan #EducandoAtitlan

story:
Hello, I'm David M. Husak Sr.

Throughout the past 8 or 10 years, I developed a stock trading system that I believe to be the SAFEST, SIMPLIEST and most ACCURATE way to trade in decades. This system takes 99% of the fear out of trading.

I originally designed and developed this system for my own personal use, but once I found the potential it has, I wanted to share it with others, especially with those who want the opportunity to take control of their own finances.

About My Campaign

The campaign is two fold. Both facets have the same level of importance.

The first is to generate the needed funds to continue the completion of our web-site along with having a strong marketing plan for the site -- keyword research for in-marketing display advertising, robot tag ads and in-depth market research.

Second is to educate the hundreds of thousands of individuals that have NO 401k and/or Pension plan, which is about 60% of our work force today. There is a strong need to help individuals that would like to have such a system.

Accomplishing a successful campaign is essential so that we may continue to advance our important message of financial self-determination to those thousands mentioned above. There is NO reason for anyone to spend hours and hours in research any more.

We did the hard work! We eliminated the need for complicated chart analysis and interpretation of seemingly endless financial data. Now ordinary folks can learn to generate that extra income they need not just for today, but for years ahead.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking to fund a $25,000 marketing, research and automation project for my methodology.  I do have a web site www.123etf.com, nearly completed already that will host the education service and I have written the training materials for the subscription service based on my core methodology.

The marketing plan includes hiring a local marketing firm to produce demographically targeted click ads to attract subscribers and to monitor the success of those campaigns and adjust as necessary. The estimate for this service is about half of the funds I seek.

The research and automation portion of the project has the most visionary and exciting purpose. The first major objective will be to accomplish the automation of the original methodology, allowing it to continue to run on it's own, but also to generate the daily analysis that goes into providing subscribers with timely trading information. Beyond that, I will seek to automate and test several of the most promising variations of my core system which I have come up with over the years, but have not had the time (due to sheer volume of information) to properly vet.

The goal of this ongoing automation and research will be to provide subscribers to my service with the most productive set of proven trading options that suit their needs and to provide timely and relevant recommendations through the service. I want to grow this trader education service beyond a one-size-fits-all approach so that traders of different means, availability and proficiency will all find a home here and a proven plan they can use successfully. Please note, this trader education service will be launched with my original core methodology as the offering, but with the plans in full motions for the expansion and adaptation I have described to the extent possible based on this success of this campaign.

Any remaining funds will go toward enhancing the educational materials and presentations of the service, including enlisting professional video production. However, I expect revenue from a growing subscriber base to be the main source of ongoing improvements to training materials. The training scripts, demos and other materials I have already produced will be refined and recorded as professional training sessions available only to subscribers.

Subscribers will not only have access to this simple and easily implemented core trading program, and ultimately to proven variations of it, but will also have materials at their disposal that will allow them to go as far into the details of the thought process behind this methodology as they may choose. Subscribers will be in control. If they wish, they will be able to go on autopilot, using the service for nothing more than our daily recommendations and results, or they will be able to go further to develop a deeper expertise as traders.

Having a successful campaign will mean that we will be well on our way to delivering this important service to those countless individuals I mentioned above who I believe need and have been waiting for a SAFE, SIMPLE and ACCURATE system such as mine.

There is NO reason that anyone needs to spend hours and hours in research any more or shell out exorbitant amounts in "advisor fees" in return for often questionable advice.

The hard work of trial and error and the pain and lessons of uncontrolled losses are behind me. This methodology is ready for prime time. Now others can learn how they can generate that extra income they need not just for today, but for years ahead.

Should this funding goal not be met entirely, priority will have to be given to marketing efforts. For without the ability to put the word out for a successful launch, all else is impossible.

However, even if I can only launch with my core trading methodology, it couldn't be more ready to serve what I believe is a vast and hungry base of potential subscribers who have long been waiting for such an opportunity. Please help me to make it happen.

If this funding campaign does not succeed in reaching even enough of the funding goal to pay for an aggressive marketing program, that plan will have to be scaled back initially as well. But this methodology simply must reach the waiting market. The time has come!

See the sidebar to the right to find out how you can participate in this groundbreaking opportunity!!

I'm on a Mission! Why you should join me...

The world is awash in cash. I recently read that there's enough currency in the world to give every man, woman and child the equivalent of 1 billion U.S. dollars. Yet, in the most prosperous nation the world has even known, a large majority of the population will work all their lives to survive with no hope of a secure retirement, and 43.1 million people live below the poverty level. This does not have to be the case.

The stock market, yes the same stock market the "experts" have told you is far too complicated for you to navigate without them, is a great American free enterprise pathway to prosperity. And, with my approach, I contend that participating successfully in the stock market in this day and age, when it's never been more accessible to every day people, can also be very simple. Yes, SIMPLE.

I said it can be simple. I didn't say easy. It's not easy because we allow emotions, a lack of discipline, so-called "experts" and confusing approaches to complicate things for us. It's time to put all that to a stop.

My promise is that with my methodology, a system so simple that you can implement it in as little as 30 minutes or less a day; a system that automatically enforces discipline and eliminates 99% of human emotion and flawed, arbitrary decision making; a methodology that involves no complicated analysis of endless financial data or technical patterns or confusing indicators and, most importantly, a system that gets those so-called "experts" and their outrageous fees out of the way, anyone can achieve success in the market.

Yes, I'm on a mission to make it so! Won't you please join me?

Ultimately, I see this mission going even beyond this worthy goal. I envision using my methodology and service to fund things like endowment funds for quality education institutions that will open opportunities to those that lack them now. Face it, not everyone wants to be a trader. But my discovery redefines what it means to make money in the markets and could open doors for the diverse desires and ambitions of so many people.

Risks & Challenges

The only impediment that I see standing in the way of achieving my goal is if this campaign fails to generate enough backers like yourself. Since the system is developed and the web site about ready, it's the marketing effort that remains critical to getting this education service noticed in each and every state. You see, the system works and only needs exposure to get it into the hands of individuals that want to take control.

There is a want and need for a SAFE, SIMPLE & ACCURATE trading system today. I believe because of the process that I have built, together we will help hundreds if not thousands of individuals reach their goals and fulfill their needs.

Other Ways You Can Help

All ambitious ventures need the support of others in some capacity in order to really take flight.

The is no exception. We need your support and enthusiasm helping with this launch. Of course, we understand that some of you may not have the funds at this time to help us directly or perhaps your interest in the area of financial matters or trading simply is lacking. That does not mean that you should throw this campaign by the wayside and move on. Please DON'T DO THAT. Perhaps your FAMILY and/or FRIENDS will see the value of such a campaign for themselves and others. So please take a moment and send an e-mail, a Facebook post, a text message or Tweet to someone today and let them know about us and our compaign to bring financial independence and self-determination to the public at large. Ask them to do the same. Help us generate some buzz! That's how we can ALL SUCCEED.

 

Thank you and God Bless,

Dave

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Allow me to introduce myself

Hello! My name’s Sylvia Arthur and I'm the founder of Libreria, a library for adults in Accra, Ghana, which I started in 2017 with approximately 1,300 of my own books.

It all began back in 2010 when I moved from London to Brussels for work and I began buying books to overcome the sense of loneliness I felt at being alone in a new city. Every week, I’d trek to my favourite second-hand bookstore and search out the latest fiction and nonfiction titles among the stacks. I’d leave with a bag full of books by diverse authors set in countries around the world on wide-ranging themes that enlightened, entertained, and inspired.

But the books soon outgrew my apartment so I began shipping them to my mum’s house in Ghana for safekeeping.

Whenever I’d visit my mum and see the books gathering dust, I’d feel guilty about them being there and not being read when there were thousands who could benefit from them. It was then that I got the idea for a library.

It took six years and a lot of passion and dedication, but I finally opened Libreria in Accra in December 2017.

Because all the books were my own, Libreria is primarily a library for adults. However, even before we officially opened, I was constantly being asked, “Do you have any children’s books?”

Libreria Kids seeks to address this need with a separate library, especially for children. We want to rent the space opposite the original adult library making it easy for families to visit both. 

Why Libreria Kids is important

The library will offer high-quality, culturally-relevant books and programmes for children, from toddlers through to young adults (YA). Through its offering, we aim to cultivate a love of reading amongst children, and use books to ignite their imaginations to the possibilities of the world. Libreria Kids will serve its community and its members with passion and dedication.

What your contribution will do

Libreria Kids is not just about giving children any-old books, but giving them access to the right kind of books that reflect the reality of who they are and where they’re from. I want children in Ghana to experience the joy of seeing themselves in a book they pick off the shelf. They may also discover books that offer mind-expanding possibilities or become their first passport to the world.

By doing this, Libreria Kids will make a huge difference to young people’s lives through improved literacy, enhanced knowledge, and increased self-confidence.

Please join me in achieving this important mission.

What we need & what you get

We need $20,000 to:

  • rent the library space for two years. After that, we aim to be self-sustaining.
  • buy the necessary fixtures and fittings (e.g. shelving, projector and screen, and wifi).
  • buy child-friendly furnishings (e.g. chairs, desks, toys).
  • purchase new, culturally-relevant books to add to our current, small children’s section.
  • pay for one staff member to look after the library.

Our way of saying thank you!

By donating to this campaign, not only will you get to contribute to the development of a child’s love of reading, but you’ll also earn some major perks!

From unique badges featuring acclaimed African women writers to your name on a donors' plaque prominently displayed in the library, you won’t regret supporting our cause.

If we don’t reach our goal...

We’ll use whatever funds we raise to rent the space and work from there to make up the shortfall so your donation won’t be in vain!

The impact

The benefits of children developing a reading habit from an early age are well recognised.

A 2015 study by The Reading Agency (UK) found that the main outcomes of ‘recreational’ reading, for pleasure or empowerment, were “enjoyment, knowledge of the self and other people, social interaction, social and cultural capital, imagination, focus and flow, relaxation and mood regulation. Improvements in young children's communication abilities and longer-term education outcomes were also reported for early years children.”

When children, particularly African children, are confronted with the misguided belief that they’re inferior - that they’re less smart or less beautiful, that they come from “shithole countries” with no jobs and no future - the odds are stacked against them from the start. We aim to instill in our readers that their identity and their reality is just as valid as anyone else’s.  

My experience with Libreria

I opened Libreria in Accra at the end of 2017 using my own collection of books and completely self-funded the library. Since it opened, we've had members come from all over the city, and from all walks of life, to browse and check out books from our extensive collection of high-quality, contemporary fiction and nonfiction. We remain the only lending library in Accra, if not Ghana. The most popular books are those by African authors, from Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie’s extensive back catalogue to Ayobami Adebayo’s highly acclaimed 2017 debut, Stay With Me.

All our books are catalogued online and patrons can view, hold and check out books using our online system.

Since we opened on 15 December 2017, we’ve hosted, or will soon host, talks with local literary lights including the writer, Nii Ayikwei Parkes and international literary stars, like the Black British writer, Afua Hirsch. We also hold community events such as Games Nights, and recently launched a scholarship and mentoring programme for girls aged 12-17 called Libreria Scholars.

Libreria has been featured and recommended in Time Out magazine in Accra and on Citi FM radio, and has made waves across the city and the country as Ghana’s leading literary space.

Community support

We’ve been overwhelmed by the outpouring of support we’ve had from people all over Ghana and the world. From help with getting the word out locally to a child in London donating the bulk of his book collection, the response to Libreria has been fantastically positive. We greatly appreciate it and are proud of the community we’ve developed.

We’re ready!

Since opening the adult library, I’ve canvassed, listened, and learned what readers want. I’ve heard the parents who’ve decried the lack of quality reading material for their children. I've listened to the children who’d love to read the latest installment from the Harry Potter series, but can’t find it locally or, when they do, it’s just too expensive. The biggest problem that libraries in Ghana face is ensuring that the books are current, and what people want to read. A fully up-and-running and sustainable Libreria Kids will overcome these hurdles to accessing quality books.

What we’ll do

We'll keep our finger on the pulse of what’s new and what’s good in children’s literature from Ghana, Africa, and across the world. We know what’ll make our children minds’ tick and what will inspire them to greatness. We will ensure that our catalogue is always up-to-date by sourcing and purchasing new books every quarter, both directly from publishers and from second-hand stores with whom we have a history.

In addition, we’ll create a board made up of parents and children to provide guidance on the library’s development and give advice on what books to purchase and the programmes we plan.

Other ways you can help

We understand that not everyone’s in a position to contribute financially. If you're not able to make a donation, there are many other ways you can help support Libreria Kids:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Tell family and friends, and friends of friends, as well as colleagues and gym buddies!
  • Share on social media e.g. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and any other social channels you're on.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word even further.

Thank you for your support!

A fully up-and-running and sustainable Libreria Kids will overcome these hurdles to accessing quality books.What we’ll doWe'll keep our finger on the pulse of what’s new and what’s good in children’s literature from Ghana, Africa, and across the world. We know what’ll make our children minds’ tick and what will inspire them to greatness. We will ensure that our catalogue is always up-to-date by sourcing and purchasing new books every quarter, both directly from publishers and from second-hand stores with whom we have a history.In addition, we’ll create a board made up of parents and children to provide guidance on the library’s development and give advice on what books to purchase and the programmes we plan.Other ways you can helpWe understand that not everyone’s in a position to contribute financially. If you're not able to make a donation, there are many other ways you can help support Libreria Kids:
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Tell family and friends, and friends of friends, as well as colleagues and gym buddies!
Share on social media e.g. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and any other social channels you're on.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word even further.
Thank you for your support!

story:
For those who don’t know me:

My name is Anass Sassaoui, I am 22 years old and from Morocco. This is my second year studying English studies at university. I am a 2017 U.S. Department of State exchange program alumnus. I am also a tutor to Peace Corps Volunteers in Moroccan Arabic, and Peace Corps trained in teaching methods, life skills and leadership facilitation. I work as a leader at a special center to support youth and children in difficult circumstances. I’m also a Moroccan summer camp camp counselor and coordinator.

What this campaign is for:

I believe that education is key to a better future for Moroccan youth, who otherwise face a high unemployment rate, limited opportunities and disillusionment. I have grown up in a small town located against the Atlas Mountains of Southern Morocco, and I have myself faced challenges getting a good education. Therefore I am taking the initiative to provide educational opportunities for kids in remote villages of the region where I live, knowing that these villages don’t have any schools or hospitals. There is only one village with a classroom, which is an old house that was provided by the village people. The kids are studying under The Non-Formal Education Program that was provided by an “Association” partnership agreement with the Moroccan Ministry of Education. Associations are organizations (NGO’s) to help often-marginalized youth gain confidence and life skills for a successful future.

These village kids have been studying in this one classroom for five years, but they were recently hit with the bad news that the Ministry of Education will cancel the Non-Formal Education Program partnership agreement with the Association that is taking charge of the program because of the bad condition of the classroom, it’s an old unsafe building and it’s about to collapse.

Once the kids finish their 6 years of primary school they will move to study in the city at an internal junior and high school and after that they will move to college. Then, they will become their community’s change makers and change their village for the better and solve other pressing social problems. But this cannot happen without a primary school classroom.

The Impact:

The short-term impact: In one hand these kids will continue their studies and they will become the change makers of their communities, and in the other hand they will start feeling that they are a part of the community and they will reconcile with the society they belong to.

The long-term impact: Most of Moroccan young men in particular who are disillusioned and depressed with educational and job opportunities, just might get radicalized either in Morocco or Europe or in The Middle East, but with this second educational opportunity will steer them away from that path.

Now, our job is to put our hands together in order to gather money so we can rebuild this classroom. This way we can keep the partnership agreement between the Association and the Ministry of Education so the kids can continue their studies, not drop out of school, and give this community hope again for a brighter future.

 by doing this we're not only solving education problem but we're lowering the huge rate of the illegal immigration and lowering the rate of youth joining the extremist organizations.

I'll keep everyone updated with the work that will be done.

How The Non-Formal Education Program works:

The Moroccan Ministry of Education has launched a program called the Non-Formal Education Program to reach out the remote communities, but to implement the program the Ministry has to make it through local NGOs. The Ministry requires the NGOs to provide a safe building (classroom) for the kids where they can study, advance to graduation, and then perhaps volunteer in those rural areas to solve their community’s problems. Once an adequate classroom is provided, the Ministry signs a partnership agreement with the NGO and then provides the kids with school supplies and a teacher with a fair enough salary.

story:
Dear friends,

Each year, AGBU Young Professionals Belgium aims to be involved in a social impact project in Armenia. As young professionals, we firmly support the importance and development of education in Armenia.

This year, we have chosen to support the N°6 school in Gyumri by providing them educational supplies (books, chairs and projector). As a group of dedicated volunteers, we will travel to Armenia in the summer and make sure your contribution has taken place properly. We will personally purchase and deliver all goods before the new school year, on September 1st, commences.

For donations, select your desired amount.

Additional:

from 25€ contribution: souvenir gift (upon request)

from 50€ contribution: personal gift by one of the school children (upon request)

We are counting on your support in helping us achieve our goal.  

Yours truly,

AGBU YP Belgium

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Հայաստա նի կրթությունը` քայլ առ քայլ

Հարգելի ընկերներ՝

Ամեն տարի Բելգիայի ՀԲԸՄ ԵԱ-ի նպատակն է ներգրավվել Հայաստանում սոցիալական ազդեցության ծրագրի մեջ։ Որպես երիտասարդ արհեստավարժներ՝ մենք մեծապես աջակցում ենք Հայաստանում կրթության կարևորությանը և զարգացմանը։

Այս տարի մենք ընտրել ենք աջակցել Գյումրու համար 6 դպրոցին՝ նրանց տրամադրելով ուսումնական պարագաներ  (գրքեր, դպրոցական գույք և այլն)։ Որպես նվիրված կամավորների  խումբ՝ մենք ամռանը կմեկնենք Հայաստան և կհամոզվենք Ձեր ներդրման պատշաճ կերպով կայացմանը։ Մենք անձնապես գնելու և առաքելու ենք բոլոր ապրանքները դպրոց սեպտեմբերի 1-ին։

Նվիրատվությունների համար խնդրում ենք օգտագործել հետևյալ հղումը և նշել Ձեր ցանկացած գումարը։

Լրացուցիչ

25-ից ներդրման դեպքում՝  հուշանվեր (ըստ ցանկության)

50-ից ներդրման դեպքում՝ երեխաների ձեռքով պատրաստված անձնական նվեր (ըստ ցանկության)

Մենք ակնկալում ենք մեր նպատակին հասնելու ձեր աջակցությանը։

 

Ամբողջովին ձեր՝

ՀԲԸՄ ԵԱ Բելգիա

25-ից ներդրման դեպքում՝  հուշանվեր (ըստ ցանկության)
50-ից ներդրման դեպքում՝ երեխաների ձեռքով պատրաստված անձնական նվեր (ըստ ցանկության)
Մենք ակնկալում ենք մեր նպատակին հասնելու ձեր աջակցությանը։
 
Ամբողջովին ձեր՝
ՀԲԸՄ ԵԱ Բելգիա

story:
Short Summary

  • We are a team of social worker and two pedagogues. We are worried of how our society effects children's development and social skills, the main problem being tablets and phones. Regarding this, we decided to open a daily center whose main focus will be the importance of outdoor games.Our municipality has provided us with space, but we need funding to renovate and adapt this space to be a creative, inspirational  and safe environment for children and youth in Gevgelija.
  • This campaign is important to us because we want to renovate and adapt a small house where we can put our knowledge and work experience in good use. Children are the future and, unfortunately, many parents and schools take their skills and development for granted. We would like to offer the best conditions where children  will feel safe, protected and happy.
  • Our contributors  will help us to provide a safe and friendly space where children  will be encouraged to develop their talents and social skills.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • These funds will be used for  renovation of our space. Specifically  we need : Fence, doors, windows, new floor,whitening the inside walls, we would like to paint  graffiti on the outside walls , sanitation, 
    carpentry and to be able to pay the working labor.  
  • Help us to create the space where the children will be eager to spend their free time, away from phones and tablets.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will give priority to the most necessities regarding the renovation.

The Impact

  • We live in a time driven by technology, where emphasis is put on the digital world instead of the real environment. The games are reduced to seating and "winning" in some virtual world, often in violent games, by using only two fingers. Since most of the games are on the screen, children's friendships are more often exposed on social networks and socializing in the neighborhoods with outdoor games becomes a topic that is unknown to children and which is most pressing - unclear.With your contribution you will help us to renovate and adapt a small house to become a space for children where they can develop their social skills, to improve their physical and mental health, and simply enjoy their childhood.

  • We'll be happy to share with you the development of the process, how the space changes in to something beautiful, and to see the progress of children development, that you've helped us to start. We're looking forward that you will be with us `` from ruins to castle``.

Risks & Challenges

  • Our qualities are that we are very passionate about this, very motivate to contribute for the well being of the children in our community.
  • Please share the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, e-mail using Indiegogo's icons above
story_txt:
Short Summary

We are a team of social worker and two pedagogues. We are worried of how our society effects children's development and social skills, the main problem being tablets and phones. Regarding this, we decided to open a daily center whose main focus will be the importance of outdoor games.Our municipality has provided us with space, but we need funding to renovate and adapt this space to be a creative, inspirational  and safe environment for children and youth in Gevgelija.
This campaign is important to us because we want to renovate and adapt a small house where we can put our knowledge and work experience in good use. Children are the future and, unfortunately, many parents and schools take their skills and development for granted. We would like to offer the best conditions where children  will feel safe, protected and happy.
Our contributors  will help us to provide a safe and friendly space where children  will be encouraged to develop their talents and social skills.

 

What We Need & What You Get

These funds will be used for  renovation of our space. Specifically  we need : Fence, doors, windows, new floor,whitening the inside walls, we would like to paint  graffiti on the outside walls , sanitation, carpentry and to be able to pay the working labor.  
Help us to create the space where the children will be eager to spend their free time, away from phones and tablets.
If we don't reach our entire goal, we will give priority to the most necessities regarding the renovation.


The Impact

We live in a time driven by technology, where emphasis is put on the digital world instead of the real environment. The games are reduced to seating and "winning" in some virtual world, often in violent games, by using only two fingers. Since most of the games are on the screen, children's friendships are more often exposed on social networks and socializing in the neighborhoods with outdoor games becomes a topic that is unknown to children and which is most pressing - unclear.With your contribution you will help us to renovate and adapt a small house to become a space for children where they can develop their social skills, to improve their physical and mental health, and simply enjoy their childhood.
We'll be happy to share with you the development of the process, how the space changes in to something beautiful, and to see the progress of children development, that you've helped us to start. We're looking forward that you will be with us `` from ruins to castle``.


Risks & Challenges
Our qualities are that we are very passionate about this, very motivate to contribute for the well being of the children in our community.
Please share the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, e-mail using Indiegogo's icons above

story:
Hi, my name is Isabelle Mary Fitzgerald.

I am the founder of MY PEACEFUL UNIVERSE an organisation that teaches MIndfulness and Meditation to Children. I am also a Mum of two divine Children aged 8 and 11.

I’m sure like many parents and families joining this Crowdfunding Campaign you are extremely concerned about the mental health and wellbeing of our beautiful children.

As we speak 1 in 7 children suffer from a mental health issue. That is over half a million Australian children in any given year alone. What is truly alarming, 50% of mental health issues are now emerging between the ages of 4 and 14!

So many parents are asking me, what can we do? How can we reverse these worrying trends?

 

My Story

Like a lot of children, I suffered low self-esteem and low self-image issues. In my early 20’s I was diagnosed with Anorexia Nervosa. This was a very difficult time for myself and my family and in my mid 30’s after having my 1st child, I began struggling with anxiety.

Discovering MEDITATION in my early 20’s really helped me manage a lot of my anxiety issues. But it was discovering MINDFULNESS that truly made a significant impact on my mental health and helped me become the mum that I am today.

Learn more about my story at mypeacefuluniverse.org

 

Why Mindfulness and Meditation?

Mindfulness and Meditation have now emerged as a fun and positive way to help children face a range of mental and emotional challenges in their young lives.

Research now shows that 8 weeks of Mindfulness and Meditation practice can help rewire our brains for happiness, and help cultivate joy in children.

Since starting my classes just this year I have been truly blessed to see first hand the positive effect Mindfulness and Meditation can have on a child's outlook on life.

In my classes, children learn how to still their minds and breath properly so they can manage sleep, stress and anxiety when it arises.

They also learn positive tools that help build confidence, resilience and self-awareness, as well as learn how to develop kindness and,  compassion towards themselves and others around them.

 

Support our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign.

As an organisation, we do have big goals. It is our mission in 2018 to make Mindfulness and Meditation accessible to 1000's of parents, families and children across Australian and in communities and around the globe.

We aim to do this in three simple ways.

 

1. Finish recording and producing one years worth of Guided Meditations for Children and Families to stream online:

  • Since making my Guided Meditations available to stream online we have reached over 35'000 listeners, providing peace calm and relaxation to parents, families and children all across the globe. The feedback from parents has been overwhelming and has brought me so much joy.

Review - 

"Hi, Isabelle. We hope you're well. I would like to thank you for sharing your beautiful meditations and positive affirmations. Our children who are 8, 6, 5 and 11 months old, love them. We listen to them every night and have made them a part of our bedtime routines. My partner and I have begun using your words think positive, feel positive, which has lead to such positive actions and feelings in our family. We have seen a great change in our children's behaviour and outlook on life, and how they treat each other as well as others around. And, to be totally honest, your meditations are having a such a positive impact on us adults too. So I would just like to say THANK YOU. May you have a peaceful and harmonious day"- 

Hanan xxx - UK

  • With your help, I aim to record and produce 32, one years worth, of Guided Meditations for Children so my meditations can continue to provide relief for families in 2018. You can stream my meditations online by clicking here.
  • I am so passionate about continuing this work, every family that contributes $100 or more to our campaign will receive a digital copy of my third album currently in production, a gift that includes 8 wonderful Guided Meditations for Children.

Stream a preview of Isabelle's "Heartfulness" Guided Meditation for Children

 
2. Personally train and mentor 100 amazing facilitators in 2018.
 
  • It is my goal to personally train and mentor 100 incredible facilitators to introduce and teach my Mindfulness and Meditation classes to 1000+ children in communities across Australia and around the world.
  • I also aim to provide support to our facilitators with our website, so that parents and families can find our facilitators in their community and enrol their children into Mindfulness and Meditation Classes quickly and easily.
  • If you are looking for an amazing opportunity to teach children how to manage their emotions, academic pressure, social media, stress and worry? Contribute $2000 to our campaign and you can attend our Facilitator Training Course. SYDNEY, MELBOURNE and BRISBANE 2018.  Dates to be announced. 

For more information on becoming a MY PEACEFUL UNIVERSE Facilitator: Click here​

 

3. Develop a fun and easy to use Mindfulness and Meditation TEACHERS PORTAL.

  • Schools across Australia and worldwide are turning to Mindfulness and Meditation as research now shows mindfulness and meditation have amazing benefits for both teachers and students.
  • It is my goal to make my Guided Meditations, Breathing Exercises and Mindfulness Resources accessible in the classroom by developing an ONLINE TEACHERS PORTAL. So that resources can be easily accessed by teachers and primary school students anytime during the school week and utilised throughout each term.

You can learn more about our MY PEACEFUL SCHOOLS PROGRAM and view our TEACHERS PORTAL currently in it's early development stage by clicking here.

 

For this crowdfunding campaign, what we need to raise is conservative compared to the magnitude of the problem. But, I believe we can achieve our 3 simple, but vital goals in 2018, and truly have a positive impact on the mental health an wellbeing of our children both here in Australia, and around the globe.

 

Do you want to be apart of something amazing! Join our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign and help us transform the lives of 1000's of Children, Parents and Families across Australia and around the globe.

 

Support and Pledge

Most of all THANK YOU for your support and investing in our children in this way. Together let's help every child learn the "life skill' of Mindfulness and Meditation. 

 

Questions & Answers

I would love to answer any questions as best as i can. You can contact me in three easy ways. 

  • Send me an email by clicking here. 
  • Facetime or call me on +61 411 079 298 between 9:30 am and 3:OO pm AEST* 
  • Or, Skype isabellemaryfitzgerald between 9:30 am and 3:00 pm AEST*

*Australian Eastern Standard Time.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word about our campaign! Forward campaign emails, share on Facebook, and use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • If we pass our Crowdfunding Goal, in 2018 I am also 100% Committed to writing and teaching an 8-week Mindfulness and Meditation Program for Parents and Teenagers. So that the whole family can benefit from improved happiness.

 

Be a be apart of something amazing! Join our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign and help us transform the lives of 1000's of Children Parents and Families across Australia and around the globe.

 

Support and Pledge

I’m sure like many parents and families joining this Crowdfunding Campaign you are extremely concerned about the mental health and wellbeing of our beautiful children.
As we speak 1 in 7 children suffer from a mental health issue. That is over half a million Australian children in any given year alone. What is truly alarming, 50% of mental health issues are now emerging between the ages of 4 and 14!
So many parents are asking me, what can we do? How can we reverse these worrying trends?
 

My Story
Like a lot of children, I suffered low self-esteem and low self-image issues. In my early 20’s I was diagnosed with Anorexia Nervosa. This was a very difficult time for myself and my family and in my mid 30’s after having my 1st child, I began struggling with anxiety.
Discovering MEDITATION in my early 20’s really helped me manage a lot of my anxiety issues. But it was discovering MINDFULNESS that truly made a significant impact on my mental health and helped me become the mum that I am today.
Learn more about my story at mypeacefuluniverse.org
 
Why Mindfulness and Meditation?
Mindfulness and Meditation have now emerged as a fun and positive way to help children face a range of mental and emotional challenges in their young lives.
Research now shows that 8 weeks of Mindfulness and Meditation practice can help rewire our brains for happiness, and help cultivate joy in children.
Since starting my classes just this year I have been truly blessed to see first hand the positive effect Mindfulness and Meditation can have on a child's outlook on life.
In my classes, children learn how to still their minds and breath properly so they can manage sleep, stress and anxiety when it arises.
They also learn positive tools that help build confidence, resilience and self-awareness, as well as learn how to develop kindness and,  compassion towards themselves and others around them.
 
Support our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign.
As an organisation, we do have big goals. It is our mission in 2018 to make Mindfulness and Meditation accessible to 1000's of parents, families and children across Australian and in communities and around the globe.
We aim to do this in three simple ways.
 
1. Finish recording and producing one years worth of Guided Meditations for Children and Families to stream online:
Since making my Guided Meditations available to stream online we have reached over 35'000 listeners, providing peace calm and relaxation to parents, families and children all across the globe. The feedback from parents has been overwhelming and has brought me so much joy.
Review - 
"Hi, Isabelle. We hope you're well. I would like to thank you for sharing your beautiful meditations and positive affirmations. Our children who are 8, 6, 5 and 11 months old, love them. We listen to them every night and have made them a part of our bedtime routines. My partner and I have begun using your words think positive, feel positive, which has lead to such positive actions and feelings in our family. We have seen a great change in our children's behaviour and outlook on life, and how they treat each other as well as others around. And, to be totally honest, your meditations are having a such a positive impact on us adults too. So I would just like to say THANK YOU. May you have a peaceful and harmonious day"- 
Hanan xxx - UK

With your help, I aim to record and produce 32, one years worth, of Guided Meditations for Children so my meditations can continue to provide relief for families in 2018. You can stream my meditations online by clicking here.

I am so passionate about continuing this work, every family that contributes $100 or more to our campaign will receive a digital copy of my third album currently in production, a gift that includes 8 wonderful Guided Meditations for Children.

Stream a preview of Isabelle's "Heartfulness" Guided Meditation for Children

 
2. Personally train and mentor 100 amazing facilitators in 2018.
 

It is my goal to personally train and mentor 100 incredible facilitators to introduce and teach my Mindfulness and Meditation classes to 1000+ children in communities across Australia and around the world.
I also aim to provide support to our facilitators with our website, so that parents and families can find our facilitators in their community and enrol their children into Mindfulness and Meditation Classes quickly and easily.
If you are looking for an amazing opportunity to teach children how to manage their emotions, academic pressure, social media, stress and worry? Contribute $2000 to our campaign and you can attend our Facilitator Training Course. SYDNEY, MELBOURNE and BRISBANE 2018.  Dates to be announced. 

For more information on becoming a MY PEACEFUL UNIVERSE Facilitator: Click here​
 
3. Develop a fun and easy to use Mindfulness and Meditation TEACHERS PORTAL.

Schools across Australia and worldwide are turning to Mindfulness and Meditation as research now shows mindfulness and meditation have amazing benefits for both teachers and students.
It is my goal to make my Guided Meditations, Breathing Exercises and Mindfulness Resources accessible in the classroom by developing an ONLINE TEACHERS PORTAL. So that resources can be easily accessed by teachers and primary school students anytime during the school week and utilised throughout each term.

You can learn more about our MY PEACEFUL SCHOOLS PROGRAM and view our TEACHERS PORTAL currently in it's early development stage by clicking here.
 
For this crowdfunding campaign, what we need to raise is conservative compared to the magnitude of the problem. But, I believe we can achieve our 3 simple, but vital goals in 2018, and truly have a positive impact on the mental health an wellbeing of our children both here in Australia, and around the globe.
 
Do you want to be apart of something amazing! Join our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign and help us transform the lives of 1000's of Children, Parents and Families across Australia and around the globe.
 
Support and Pledge


Most of all THANK YOU for your support and investing in our children in this way. Together let's help every child learn the "life skill' of Mindfulness and Meditation. 
 
Questions & Answers
I would love to answer any questions as best as i can. You can contact me in three easy ways. 

Send me an email by clicking here. 
Facetime or call me on +61 411 079 298 between 9:30 am and 3:OO pm AEST* 
Or, Skype isabellemaryfitzgerald between 9:30 am and 3:00 pm AEST*

*Australian Eastern Standard Time.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about our campaign! Forward campaign emails, share on Facebook, and use the Indiegogo share tools!
If we pass our Crowdfunding Goal, in 2018 I am also 100% Committed to writing and teaching an 8-week Mindfulness and Meditation Program for Parents and Teenagers. So that the whole family can benefit from improved happiness.

 
Be a be apart of something amazing! Join our Mindfulness and Meditation Crowdfunding Campaign and help us transform the lives of 1000's of Children Parents and Families across Australia and around the globe.
 
Support and Pledge

story:
Our Mission

The vision of Teach For Nigeria is that one day, all children will attain an excellent education. To achieve this vision, we are building a movement of leaders who will work to end educational inequity. Teach For Nigeria recruits Nigeria's most outstanding graduates, young professionals and existing teachers and places them as full time teachers in under-resourced schools for two years through the Fellowship program.

This year, 216 Fellows are impacting more than 13,000 children in 64 low-income schools across 3 states - in Lagos, Ogun and Kaduna State.

The Problem

Nigeria’s population will double in thirty years, becoming the third most populous nation in the world. Imagine the future Nigeria could create by developing the potential of this coming generation.

Yet Nigeria’s educational infrastructure is not equipped to achieve this—Nigeria will need to leverage technology, develop more teachers and better curriculum, strengthen school leadership, improve child nutrition, and much more. This will require dynamic, and determined leadership of Nigerians addressing our challenges and innovating for the future.

Fortunately, our nation already has much of what it needs to thrive, a wealth of incredible talent!

The Solution

Teach For Nigeria recruits Nigeria's most outstanding graduates, young professionals and existing teachers and places them as full time teachers in under-resourced schools for two years. In the short run, these young leaders act as a source of dedicated teachers in government and low-income private schools. 

Long-Term Impact

In the long run, Teach For Nigeria will build a powerful and ever-growing leadership force of alumni who, informed by their experiences and insights, will work from inside and outside the educational system to effect the fundamental, long-term changes necessary to ultimately realise educational opportunity for all. 

Fundraising Goal

The next five years will be critical as we work to grow towards our target of placing over 1500 Fellows to serve nearly 500,000 of Nigeria’s poorest students by 2023.

To expand and deepen our impact, Teach For Nigeria is raising funds to unlock a $50,000 grant.

Now through April 30th, each donation is doubled (for instance, $50 becomes $100) due to this generous matching grant. Every single donation will make a difference and help us reach our campaign goal of $50,000.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Rocket School - Summary

I am a long time entrepreneur and researcher.  In the early 80's I was a guide on the Colorado River and I started a company to make an invention called Chums, a simple cotton eyeglass retainer.  I went on to build the company to 60 employees and we sold over 30 million Chums made in our own factory.  After about 5 years of making Chums. I began researching alternative energy concepts, built a machine shop and have learned a lot about various technologies.  I am  still involved in energy research and have been studying a rare formation of hydrogen for over 5 years. 

I am also passionate about the maker movement and have visited over a dozen MakerSpaces around the US.  I was hired by Southern Utah University to help them get their new makerspace started.  

But, what I REALLY enjoy is passing forward my 4 decades of experience to young inventors and future scientists.   

The two "Rocket School"  kits are well thought out and will include just about everything needed, except basic stuff like scissors, white glue and masking tape.  I will make a  good video which will teach the basics to the teacher/mentors so that the written instructions will be easier to follow.  

For me this is the start of something important.  I am passionate about STEM initiatives and it will be really fun to promote and grow Rocket School.   For example, there is a middle school in Brazil that designed a "cube sat", a micro satellite, and they got the Japanese Space Agency to carry it to orbit.  How incredible for those kids and how much they will learn!

Chums was well known for excellent customer service and I plan to make Rocket School just as great!  

Help spread the word and many more young people can learn rocketry, build a model and launch it. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I am offering 2 kits plus an extra rockets package.  There are also 2 cool hats and a T-shirt you can buy to support the campaign.  Thanks! Mike

 

The Impact

 Getting young people more knowledgeable about rocketry and space exploration is the simple goal.  For many they will at least have a little background and hands on experience.  But, there always a few that get really excited about it an it may help shape their lives and career. 

Risks & Challenges

Of course with a rocket that reaches speeds of several hundred miles and hour a high degree of safety is very important.  I will assemble great videos that help the mentors learn all they need to know to run a safe program. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just spread the word and wear the hats!  Thanks!
